content.body: When do you think import attributes for type: "text" will be supported?
I'm not aware of any existing proposal for a `type: 'text'` import attribute, only `type: 'json'`
content.formatted_body: I'm not aware of any existing proposal for a type: 'text' import attribute, only type: 'json'

content.body: yeah I noticed that. I can see references to it in discussions, but no follow-up. Not sure if it's contentious as json was added quickly. Perhaps the encoding complicated it.
